mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SSM_CUSTOMER ( customer_id, customer_password, customer_name, customer_address, customer_contact, customer_email, customer_grade) VALUES ( #{customer_id}, #{customer_password}, #{customer_name}, #{customer_address}, #{customer_contact}, #{customer_email}, #{customer_grade} )
INSERT INTO TB_SHQ_STORE_INBOUND ( inbound_id, store_id, store_inbound_date, goods_id, store_inbound_quantity ) VALUES ( #{inboundId}, #{storeId}, SYSDATE, #{goodsId}, #{storeInboundQuantity} )
